Content.Text:
<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ahh, perfect timing. I was just on my way to see
you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If you have some free time, I thought you might
care for a date.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The weather is splendid today. It's beautiful,
clear days like this that make me yearn for a
horseback ride.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, haven't I told you?
<PAGE>
Horseback riding was a hobby of mine, back
when I was still a student. I haven't gone for a
ride since moving back here, though.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's been a long time. Maybe I should saddle up
again sometime soon.
<PAGE>
Once I've picked it up again, I could let you ride
behind me. How does a nice, long trail ride
sound?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh? That's too bad. Ah, well. If you ever change
your mind, let me know.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, we should best head back. Allow me
to escort you home.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah! Good to hear you sound so excited.
<PAGE>
I'm afraid I can't guarantee a white horse, and
you'd be riding behind not a prince but a fusty
old man, but bear with me.
<PAGE>
I promise, for that one day, I will treat you like a
princess.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Though I try to treat you like a princess every
day -- I can't help that -- so it might not be so
different from the norm.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, come now. Don't be angry. I'm not trying to
treat you like a child.
<PAGE>
You are my one and only, and you are precious
to me. What man doesn't want to pamper the
one he cares about?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha! Are you blushing? How endearing!
<PAGE>
Be careful, now. Keep reacting like that and I
might just sweep you into my arms, never mind
if anyone is watching.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I would love to stay and talk with you
more, but it is time for me to return.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Allow me to escort you home. If you would give
me your hand, m'lady?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wait, I sounded more like Giorgio just now,
didn't I?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I suppose I'll need to study the proper diction
before our ride together.
<PAGE>
But for now, I'm afraid you will have to put up
with it. Let us be off, m'lady.
